rules_text:
Ward–Pay 4 life. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 4 life.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may return it to your hand. If you do, you may put a creature card in your hand with equal or lesser mana value than the returned creature onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
